Talk_43:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>The boss talks a lot about these ruins. But it's
the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> he can't get out of his head.

He's got to be upset being left here when the
big work's being done there.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_44:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>The boss talks and talks about these ruins. But
he can't let this whole <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> thing go.

He's got to be upset being left here when the
big work's being done there.

Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him something at Mubs's
general store tomorrow and deliver it to him.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have questions about Lookout
Landing, I'm not your guy.

Scorpis? Scorpis is your guy. He's over in
the center area.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him some cheese at Mubs's
store tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him some milk at Mubs's
store tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Our research division has been grateful
for the Zonai ruins falling down due to
the Upheaval.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him something at Mubs's
store tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But if this world gets taken over by the
Demon King, all this research would be
the last thing we'd be concerned with.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him some Hylian rice at
Mubs's store tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Poor guy. Maybe I'll buy him a Hyrule bass at
Mubs's store tomorrow...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If someone capable of bringing about
the Upheaval has been revived...

Well, even if we run away in a balloon,
we'll be caught up in all of it.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Could we ask Hudson from <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>
to make us a balloon that could fight
back? I'm just spitballing here.
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>To think that she might be somewhere
so dangerous...

I'm frustrated with myself that I couldn't
do anything.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's great, boss!


Your genius may even surpass that
of <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff>!
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I'm <sp:5:1:0>the type of person who prefers to
focus wholly on the task at hand.

So if you need something, talk to
me later.
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Er... <sp:5:0:0>I'm <sp:5:1:0>the type of person who prefers to
focus wholly on the task at hand.

So if you need something, talk to
me later.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Well, <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> is investigating <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>.
She's certain it'll provide clues about
Princess Zelda.
But progress isn't great, <sp:5:0:0>I've heard.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> is searching frantically, but we still
haven't found anything...
Talk_56:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Let's see...<sp:5:1:0> "Ones held y honore <sp:5:0:0>als hochmayde to
<sp:5:0:0>kyng Rauru ond quen Sonia, <sp:5:0:0>thaerafter to his suster
ond to princesse Zelda.<sp:0:4:0>"Her on thaes grete stan ond twelf <sp:5:0:0>mo withalle make
y endite min time with the hyred roial.<sp:0:4:0>"So michte heore remembraunce preserven <sp:5:0:0>for the
sake of hem on whom oure hope raeste." I think
that's what it says, anyway.
Ugh, I don't think I'm understanding a single bit
of this.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Uh... <sp:5:0:0>Hey...<sp:5:1:0> I'm really focused on my
research right now and need to be
left undisturbed.
So if there's something you need, can you
try me later?

I have ancient Hyrulean text to decipher.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>If Wortsworth's investigating it, then that
must mean this is an incredible ruin...

That settles it. I'm going to help too!<sp:5:1:0>
This is exactly the kind of thing I've
been studying for!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Boss! Did you read in the paper that the
Demon King has revived? Seems like the
Upheaval must've been an omen to that.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Er... <sp:5:0:0>Sorry...<sp:5:1:0> I'm pretty picky when
selecting ingredients, so if there's
something you need, talk to me later.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Er... <sp:5:0:0>Sorry...<sp:5:1:0> I'm pretty picky about
ingredients, so if there's something
you need, can it happen later?
I'm going to go pick up my breakfast at
Mubs's shop.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's hard to believe these ruins just fell
from the sky. I mean, they're from the age
of legends, and now they're here!
It's all so strange, huh?
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Er... <sp:5:1:0>I'm pretty picky when selecting
ingredients, so if there's something you
need, can it happen later?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah, it sure is. But it's also a great
opportunity. All of us on the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey
Team <clr:ffff>should count ourselves lucky.
If it weren't for <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>, this never
would've happened. Not that anyone
knows what the Upheaval even is...
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Sorry... <sp:5:0:0>I'm <sp:5:1:0>the type of person who
values punctuality.

So if you need something, come talk to
me later.

I need to go listen to a survey report from
my boss now.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Well, <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>'s looking into it. She's holed
up in her <clr:0000>research lab<clr:ffff> inside the fort,
trying to make sense of things.
She figures if she better understands <clr:0000>the
Upheaval<clr:ffff>, she'll find some sort of lead on
the princess.
But so far, nothing...
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I need to go listen to a survey report from
my boss now.

So if you need something, come talk to
me later.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It'd be great to understand more about
the Upheaval, but the safety of the
princess has to come first.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Sorry... <sp:5:0:0>I'm <sp:5:1:0>the type of person who
values punctuality.

So if you need something, come talk to
me later.

My boss is over in some ruins on the
north side, so I need to hustle over
there to listen to the survey results.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>'s in the <clr:0000>research lab <clr:ffff>searching
frantically for clues to find her, but we
haven't had much luck just yet.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Uh...


I prefer to keep work and my personal
time separate, so can you bother me
some other time?
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Uh...


I prefer to keep work and my personal
time separate, so can you bother me
some other time?
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Uh...


I prefer to keep work and my personal
time separate, so can you bother me
some other time?
I'm all wrapped up for the day, see.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It was you, wasn't it?<sp:5:0:0> You're the one who
bought every last ingredient,<sp:5:1:0> didn't you?

That's a whole lot of food for just
one person.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease_01>Ha!<sp:5:0:0> Eh, just ignore me.


I'm probably a bit salty because now
I have to miss a meal.

I'll just sit here and smell all the scents of
other people's food. I'm sure that'll fill me
up no problem.
Talk_13:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Is the princess all right, wherever she is?


These ruins right here are exceptional. But really,
who cares about that at a time like this?<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's so many ingredients to choose
from. It's a bit overwhelming trying to
decide what to buy!
It's a good problem to have, really.
